#summary Delete VMail from a user's feed

==Description==
  * *Authorization Level:* require_user


==Parameters==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#E0FFFF; border:1px solid #48D1CC; margin: 0px; width: 100%">
||*Required*||*Name*||*Type*||*Description*||
||required||message_id||string||Message ID of the VMail being removed from the feed.||
|| ||type||string||Type of message to delete from the feed. {'vmailRecv', 'vmailSent','callEvent', 'vmailPostRecv','vmailPostPublic', 'other'}||
</table>


==Error Codes==
<table cellpadding="2" style="background-color:#FFC0CB; border:1px solid #CD5C5C; margin: 0px;">
||*Code*||*Exception*||*Description*||
||401||UnauthorizedAccessException||You are not authorized to access this resource. Authorized as ####.||
</table>
